data.title: Praying with Anger
data.meta_description: M. Night’s First Feature Film “In a land torn apart by hate, he found the strength to love…” A US-born student returns to his Indian roots after being shipped off to college for a year [...]
data.text:
M. Night’s First Feature Film

“In a land torn apart by hate, he found the strength to love…”

A US-born student returns to his Indian roots after being shipped off to college for a year in his parents’ homeland.

Where’s the information?

We don’t really have much to go on, as we have not been able to locate a copy of the film on VHS or DVD.

RELEASE DATE: Sept. 15, 1993

Cast

M. Night Shyamalan – Dev Raman

Mike Muthu – Sanjay

Richa Ahuja – Rupal Mohan

Sushma Ahuja – Mrs. Mohan

Crew

Director: M. Night Shyamalan

Produced By:Jayalakshmi Shyamalan, Nelliate C. Shyamalan and M. Night Shyamalan.

Writer:M. Night Shyamalan

Editor:Frank Reynolds

Cinematography:Madhu Ambat

Art Director:Krishnamurthy

Original Music: Edmund Choi

Sound Department:Annette Danto (sound), Ira Spiegel (supervising sound editor) and Reilly Steele (sound re-recording mixer).

Miscellaneous Crew: Gary Scarpulla

Genre

Comedy and Drama

Running Time

1 hr. 41 min.

MPAA Rating

PG-13

Production Companies

Crescent Moon

Distributors

Cinevista (1993) (USA)

Release Dates
